column4: hello, what driver should I use to enable 3d aceleration or minimun 2d on VIA Chrome9 HC IGP Family for Ubuntu 12.04? i donÂ´t know if openchrome works fine. Thank you
you won't get 3D accel with that chip
you may need a /etc/X11/xorg.conf file to make it work at the res you desire. They aren't great chips at all
